about.title: About Me
about.text: I am Elderson Luciano Mezzomo, a dedicated and creative Frontend Developer with a passion for JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. I have a unique combination of team leadership experience, analytical thinking, and solid knowledge in frontend development. With a passion for exact sciences, I have acquired strong skills in frontend development and now strive to further develop my technical skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.

skills.title: Skills
list: Design Tools: Figma, Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Project Management and Agile Methods: Scrum (Certified Scrum Master), Kanban
Software and Tools: Git, VS Code, Google Cloud

project1.desc: Central CAIXA is an app that brings together all the available applications from Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal in one place. Customers can quickly access all Caixa apps via Central CAIXA. If an app is displayed in color, it is already installed on the device. Apps shown in gray indicate that the application is not yet installed. Additionally, Central CAIXA provides direct access to social networks, phone numbers, and other important links, making it easier for customers to manage and use Caixa services.
